I am Khalil Idris

I specialize in UI/UX design, product design and web application development.

View My Work

Creative Process

All design projects are thoroughly planned, designed and protyped before delivered to a client or product manager.

1

Define the Problem

I always ask clients 2 questions: What's the problem that you're facing? and what's the objective?

2

Design Planning & Research

I brainstorm concepts by creating moodboards in Sketch. I source my inspiration from Dribbble, Pinterest, Behance and Google.

3

Design & Prototyping

I begin drafting taskflows and wireframes in Sketch. In addition, I modify my prototypes.

4

Deliver Product

I discuss with my client/PM to get feedback to see where final improvements need to be made.
